start.message:
Welcome to Crypto Services Bot! ðŸš€
Choose a crypto service category to explore or request a project:

services_smartcontracts_erc.description:
ERC20 / ERC721 / ERC1155 Contracts:
We create secure and functional ERC token contracts customized for your project.

services_smartcontracts_defi.description:
DeFi Protocols (Staking, Farming):
Design and deploy DeFi protocols, including staking, farming, and liquidity pools.

services_smartcontracts_dao.description:
DAO Governance Contracts:
Develop DAO smart contracts for decentralized governance and voting.

services_smartcontracts_custom.description:
Custom Contract Logic:
Custom smart contract development tailored for unique blockchain solutions.

services_tokens_erc20.description:
ERC20 Tokens:
We create secure ERC20 tokens with custom features for your project.

services_tokens_bep20.description:
BEP20 Tokens:
Deploy BEP20 tokens on Binance Smart Chain with full functionality and safety.

services_tokens_deflationary.description:
Deflationary Tokens:
Custom tokenomics with burning mechanisms to create scarcity and value.

services_tokens_stable.description:
Stablecoins:
Create stablecoins pegged to fiat or crypto with secure smart contract logic.

services_tokens_utility.description:
Utility & Governance Tokens:
Design tokens for governance, staking, and platform utility.

services_tokens_multichain.description:
Multi-chain Deployment:
Deploy your tokens across multiple blockchains seamlessly.

services_nfts_minting.description:
NFT Minting Platforms:
We develop NFT minting platforms with custom smart contracts and marketplace integration.

services_nfts_marketplace.description:
NFT Marketplace Integration:
Integrate NFTs with marketplaces like OpenSea or custom platforms.

services_nfts_generative.description:
Generative Art NFTs:
Create generative NFT collections using smart contract-driven algorithms.

services_nfts_gameassets.description:
Play-to-Earn Game Assets:
Develop NFTs for P2E games and in-game economies.

services_nfts_virtual.description:
Virtual Land / Metaverse Integration:
Integrate virtual land and assets into metaverse platforms.

services_dapps_web3.description:
Web3 Integration:
Integrate your application with Ethereum and other blockchain networks.

services_dapps_custom.description:
Custom DApp Development:
Develop decentralized applications tailored to your business requirements.

services_dapps_contracts.description:
Smart Contract Interaction:
Connect your DApp with smart contracts for seamless blockchain functionality.

services_trading_bots.description:
Trading Bots:
Develop custom trading bots for automated strategies and execution.

services_trading_algo.description:
Algorithmic Strategies:
Design algorithmic trading strategies for crypto markets.

services_trading_portfolio.description:
Portfolio Automation:
Automate portfolio management and rebalancing for crypto assets.

services_audit_contracts.description:
Smart Contract Audits:
Conduct comprehensive audits to ensure contract security and correctness.

services_audit_security.description:
Security Assessments:
Evaluate the security of your blockchain applications and infrastructure.

services_consulting_advisory.description:
Project Advisory:
Get expert guidance for your blockchain and crypto projects.

services_consulting_research.description:
Market Research:
Detailed research and analysis of blockchain markets and trends.

services_marketing_community.description:
Community Management:
Manage and grow your crypto community effectively.

services_marketing_campaigns.description:
Marketing Campaigns:
Launch marketing campaigns to promote your blockchain project.

services_exchange.message: Exchange & Wallet Setup: Select a subservice

services_exchange_integration.description:
Exchange Integration:
Integrate your project with crypto exchanges for trading functionality.

services_exchange_wallet.description:
Wallet Setup:
Setup secure wallets and handle crypto transactions efficiently.
